items.title: Wiegman gets honorary damehood in New Year Honours
items.summary: Ice skaters Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean become a dame and knight in the New Year Honours list, while England women's manager Sarina Wiegman is made an honorary dame.

items.title: FIFA komt met nieuw format voor prijsuitreiking en wil concurreren met Ballon d'Or
items.summary: De FIFA heeft afscheid genomen van het jaarlijkse voetbalgala waarop de speler van het jaar wordt uitgeroepen. The Best FIFA Football Awards maken plaats voor een nieuw format dat een nieuwe, grote uitdager voor de Ballon d'Or moet voorstellen. De FIFA is hiervoor een samenwerking aangegaan met de sportbond van de overheid van Dubai.

items.title: Wytse van der Goot is met afstand de beste commentator van Nederland
items.summary: Wytse van der Goot is veruit de beste tv-voetbalcommentator van Nederland. Althans, dat is de mening van de VI-lezer. Met een overweldigende meerderheid werd Van der Goot bekroond voor zijn werk op Ziggo Sport.

items.title: Aston Villa the thorn in Arsenal‚Äôs side that Arteta has to remove for title push
items.summary: Villa have sunk the Gunners‚Äô title hopes in recent seasons but Gabriel‚Äôs return ready for Tuesday could be crucial It may be more than six years since Unai Emery left Arsenal but it‚Äôs hard to escape the feeling that the Spaniard still has an inexorable hold over his former club. Ever since Aston Villa ended a four-match losing streak against them with a 1-0 home win in December 2023, Emery has proved to be a thorn in Mikel Arteta‚Äôs side. Villa‚Äôs 2-0 victory at the Emirates a few months later ultimately cost Arsenal the title as a relentless Manchester City took advantage by winning their last eight matches. Arsenal had an impressive 2-0 triumph in Birmingham at the start of last season, but Villa‚Äôs comeback from two goals down to draw 2-2 in January of this year was symptomatic of Arsenal‚Äôs failure to chase down Liverpool in the title race that never was. Continue reading...

items.title: Brook? Root? Maxwell? Sharma? Who took the BEST catch of 2025?
items.summary: Watch some of the best cricket catches hat happened in front of the Sky Sports cameras in 2025, including beauties from Harry Brook, Will Jacks, Glenn Phillips, Deepti Sharma, Charlie Dean and Joe Root.

items.title: Beste commentator van Nederland: bekijk hier de hele uitslag
items.summary: Wytse van der Goot van Ziggo Sport is door een overweldigende meerderheid van de VI-lezers ¬≠uitgeroepen tot beste tv-voetbalcommentator van Nederland. Van der Goot ontving 59 procent van de ruim 16.000 stemmen. Sierd de Vos (Ziggo) en Vincent Schildkamp (ESPN & Ziggo) pakten respectievelijk het zilver en brons met 14 en 13 procent.

items.title: Egyptische bondscoach legt uit waarom Salah en Marmoush niet speelden
items.summary: Egypte was na twee speelrondes al zeker van de knock-outfase van de Afrika Cup. Dat was voor bondscoach Hossam Hassan reden om onder andere sterspelers Mohamed Salah en Omar Marmoush rust te geven in het laatste groepsduel met Angola. Dat was direct terug te zien in het resultaat ( 0-0 ) en dus gaf Hassan na het duel tekst en uitleg over zijn keuzes.

items.title: Diba overstag na gesprek met Hoefkens: 'Hij raakte echt de juiste snaar'
items.summary: Anouar Diba (42) is toegevoegd aan de technische staf van NAC Breda. Aanvankelijk zag de oud-spelmaker het helemaal niet zitten, om bij het eerste elftal aan de slag te gaan. Maar na het zien van de wedstrijden en een goed gesprek met trainer Carl Hoefkens sloeg dat om.

items.title: Can 'Champagne Charlie' upset Van Veen and reach Ally Pally quarter-finals?
items.summary: 'Champagne' Charlie Manby takes on Gian van Veen at the World Darts Championship on Tuesday with a quarter-final spot on the line.

items.title: Archer, Tongue named in England's T20 World Cup squad
items.summary: Jofra Archer has been included in England's provisional T20 World Cup squad after his Ashes-ending injury, with fellow fast bowler Josh Tongue also named in a 15-player group for February and March's tournament in India and Sri Lanka.

items.title: Honours for football executives who helped save Celtic and Hearts
items.summary: Former Celtic chief executive Fergus McCann and ex-Hearts chair Ann Budge have been recognised in the New Year Honours.

items.title: Sharp shooters: the best sports photos of 2025 and the stories behind them
items.summary: From long exposures of motor racing to remote-operated cameras at football matches, here‚Äôs how our favourite sports images were made Tom Jenkins‚Äôs best sport photographs of 2025 How one of the best tennis photos was taken We‚Äôve received more than 500,000 sports photographs in the past year, with some absolute belters among them. Here are some of the fleeting moments, wild celebrations and creative compositions that caught our eyes ‚Äì accompanied by explanations and technical info from the photographers themselves. Chloe Kelly celebrates by Florencia Tan Jun (1/200th sec, f/2.8, ISO 2500) Continue reading...

items.title: The alternative 2025 sports awards: quotes, gaffes and animal cameos
items.summary: The best and worst of 2025 ‚Äì featuring devotion in DC, late-night tweeting and the fly that sank a birdie The White House, issuing a communique to reporters covering April‚Äôs global market meltdown over tariffs as US losses hit $6.6tn (¬£4.9tn) in two days. ‚ÄúThe President won his second round matchup of the Senior Club Championship today in Jupiter, FL, and advances to the Championship Round tomorrow.‚Äù Continue reading...

items.title: Wolverhampton hosts nine-race card on Tuesday
items.summary: Intervention and Accrual are set to face off in the feature contest tonight at Wolverhampton - live on Sky Sports Racing.

items.title: Ronaldo wants 1k goals; open to Europe return
items.summary: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo has reiterated his desire to reach 1,000 career goals before he calls time on his playing career.

items.title: Hakimi returns as Morocco seal AFCON knockouts
items.summary: Africa Cup of Nations hosts Morocco dispatched Zambia 3-0 at a fervid Prince Moulay Abdellah Stadium in Rabat on Monday to round off their Group A campaign in style and ease into the round of 16.

items.title: Wrexham into top half of Championship after win
items.summary: null

items.title: Why is the USWNT so low on the top 50 of ESPN FC Women's Rank?
items.summary: For the first time ever, a USWNT player isn't in the top 20 of ESPN FC Women's Rank, our list of the top 50 players in the world. Why?

items.title: Ranked: The top 50 women's soccer players in the world
items.summary: An expert panel of coaches, GMs and journalists ranked the 50 best women's soccer players in the world.

items.title: Littler 'given a work-out' but battles past Cross
items.summary: Rob Cross made the world number one work for it, but Luke Littler stood firm to book his place in the quarter finals.
